name: Nirmal Pet
overview:
Integrated in the year 2009 at Mohali (Punjab, India), we, “Nirmal Pet”, are known as the renowned manufacturer and supplier of the best quality Pet Preforms, Pet Bottles, Plastic Granules, Plastic Powder for Water Tanks and Aluminum Caps.

Our Products : Pet Preforms, Pet Bottles, Plastic Granules, Plastic Powder for Water Tanks and Aluminum Caps.

Infrastructural Facilities: We have established a well-developed infrastructural base that is built over a huge area of land. Our infrastructure is equipped with latest machines and advanced quality testing facilities that enable us to offer clients high quality product range in bulk.

Our Team: We are supported by a team of highly skilled professionals, who enable us to offer clients durable range of products. In our team, we have selected highly experienced and skilled personnel, who have sound understanding in their concerned domain, which results in relentless quality services to the customers.

Client Satisfaction: The main aim of our company is to make all of our clients satisfied by providing flawless range of products. The client conscious approach of our professionals helped us to retain the trust of clients and on the other hand helped us in establishing ourselves as the most trusted name in the industry.

Why Us?: We have emerged as the leading manufacturer and supplier of a wide gamut of Pet Preforms, Pet Bottles, Plastic Granules, Plastic Powder for Water Tanks and Aluminum Caps.
